the key item is locked away in the Iron Safe, which is famous for being unbreakable even by Megante, and I'm having trouble getting it
out. I'm having a hard time getting it out. If you would be so kind as to assist me in obtaining the legendary armor?

165798.「おお…… 年月を積み重ねて にじみ出る\n 独特の風格と なお美しい たてじま:

165799.<icon_exc>「……失礼いたしました。\n 念願の伝説の防具を 手に入れた:

and these boxer shorts are perfect. Thank you so much. It's my way of saying thank you. Please accept it.

165800.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「これで 一流の:

165802.「鉄の金庫を持っていると 旅の途中で\n 死んでしまい 教会に戻ることになっても:
